info.title: GTMCatalogService
info.description: APIs for Cloud Solution Provider partners accessing catalog data

get.summary: Retrieves all availabilities for the requested context.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The product Id.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: The sku Id.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country information. Two letter representation of country

parameters.name: targetSegment
parameters.description: The optional segment filter.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization Bearer token

parameters.name: ms-correlationid
parameters.description: Used for tracking requests internally. If a ms-correlationid is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

parameters.name: ms-cv
parameters.description: Used for tracking requests internally. If a ms-cv is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

parameters.name: ms-requestid
parameters.description: Used for idempotency of requests. If a ms-requestid is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

200.description: The request was successful. The availabilities are returned in the response body.

get.summary: Retrieves all products using country and locale information.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country information. Two letter representation of country

parameters.name: targetView
parameters.description: The catalog view being requested.

parameters.name: targetSegment
parameters.description: The optional segment filter.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization Bearer token

parameters.name: ms-correlationid
parameters.description: Used for tracking requests internally. If a ms-correlationid is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

parameters.name: ms-cv
parameters.description: Used for tracking requests internally. If a ms-cv is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

parameters.name: ms-requestid
parameters.description: Used for idempotency of requests. If a ms-requestid is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

200.description: The request was successful. The products are returned in the response body.

get.summary: Retrieves a product by its identifier using country and locale information.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The product identifier.

parameters.name: ms-cv
parameters.description: Used for tracking requests internally. If a ms-cv is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

parameters.name: ms-requestid
parameters.description: Used for idempotency of requests. If a ms-requestid is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

200.description: The request was successful. The requested products are returned in the response body.

post.summary: Retrieves inventory validation results for the provided country.

parameters.name: inventoryCheckRequest
parameters.description: The inventory check request.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country information. Two letter representation of country

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authorization Bearer token

parameters.name: ms-correlationid
parameters.description: Used for tracking requests internally. If a ms-correlationid is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

parameters.name: ms-cv
parameters.description: Used for tracking requests internally. If a ms-cv is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

parameters.name: ms-requestid
parameters.description: Used for idempotency of requests. If a ms-requestid is not provided, the server will generate a new one for each request

200.description: The request was successful. The inventory results are returned in the response body.
